is ultimately moving a lot into Amazon I would really focus on your network in right off the bat and specifically on

so we at NDI try to stick to the corporate framework to marry AIT with

could have scripts which look at their health and restart an instance so that your end users can achieve those
nine-nine's and you know experience nine-nine's those are huge wins being

our controls along with all of the information we got from Amazon to just validate whether or not moving
